verbs.description: [repair shop] to [V: reopen] [ARG3: with new owners] and return items a local repair shop that closed its doors without notice will reopen soon with a new owner customers who waited months to get back the items they dropped off to be fixed are finally able to pick up items pembroke pines robert engel miami adriana bukstel investigator sasha jones property manager pembroke pines florida sasha springer jones nbc
